Description: Funerary papyrus of Apollodotus containing Book of Breathing written in hieratic script recto and verso.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: Herbin, F.-R., Books of Breathing and Related Texts (Catalogue of the Books of the Dead and Other Related Texts in the British Museum IV), London, 2008, pp. 143-144, pls. 123-126.
